Name: Ying Rui (應瑞)
Propulsion: Three-shaft Parsons steam turbines, 2 cylindrical and 4 White-Foster boilers; 6,000 hp (4,500 kW)
Range: 5,000 nmi (9,300 km) at 10 kn (12 mph; 19 km/h)
Armament:
2 x 1 - Vickers Mark J 6-inch (152 mm)/45 guns[1]
4 x 1 - 4 in (100 mm)/50 guns
4 x 1 - 14pdr QF guns
6 x 1 - 47/40 Hotchkiss guns
2 × 37 mm (1 in) Maxim guns
2 × 18 in (457 mm) torpedo tubes
Armour:
Deck: 0.75–1.5 inches (1.9–3.8 cm)
Conning tower: 3 in (7.6 cm)
